name: sage
description: AI Task Management Assistant for Claude. Analyze tasks, set priorities, manage reminders, and integrate with Apple Reminders, Notion, and Calendar.

tools.name: check_setup_status
tools.description: Check if sage has been configured. Returns setup status and guidance.

tools.name: start_setup_wizard
tools.description: Start the interactive setup wizard for sage. Returns the first question.

tools.name: answer_wizard_question
tools.description: Answer a question in the setup wizard and get the next question.

tools.name: save_config
tools.description: Save the configuration after completing the setup wizard.

tools.name: analyze_tasks
tools.description: Analyze tasks to determine priority, estimate time, and identify stakeholders.

tools.name: set_reminder
tools.description: Set a reminder for a task in Apple Reminders or Notion.

tools.name: find_available_slots
tools.description: Find available time slots in the calendar for scheduling tasks.

tools.name: sync_to_notion
tools.description: Sync a task to Notion database for long-term tracking.

tools.name: list_todos
tools.description: List all todos from Apple Reminders and Notion with optional filtering.

tools.name: update_task_status
tools.description: Update the status of a task and optionally sync across sources.
